nodes.bodyText: I implemented that as you said in the scss
I implemented that in my last commit, but not using the scss but by helper classes

I implemented that as well in my last commit.
And thanks for all the suggestions btw 😄
Instead of [ngClass] = ... you could use [class.answer-approved]="studentQuestionAnswer.tutorApproved" which is cleaner ImO, but feel free to keep your code if you like it better
I agree that it is cleaner. I now use your suggested implementation 👍
I think angular events do not bubble like normal javascript dom events -> event.stopPropagagtion is not needed
